Name: Ele-Mental
About the game: Ele-Mental offers a fast paced exciting one of a kind gameplay experience, perfect for local multiplayer or solo fun! Switch Ele-Ments at the press of a button, dodge opposing Ele-Ments while absorbing those that match. Game Modes 100 Progressively challenging missions. 50 Survivals, from Casual to Ninja Pro. Doubled with Relentless mode. 10 Survival Decathlons. 10 Arcade Machines, each with 8 rounds. (Can you perfect them all) (I Can't) Creator Mode, create your own Missions and Survivals using all of the games mods and enemies. Little Ele-Venture, text based story adventure. Can you do the thing? (Normal and Hardcore) Free Party Mode - Unlocks all Missions, Survival, Arcade and Creator in Competitive play, allowing for an untested number of players in a tournament. Game Features 1-4 player co-op on everything above. Steam Leaderboards for Survival, Missions, Arcade and Story modes. Pure co-op, for 2 or 4 players you are restricted charging Ele-Ments so you must rely on your team mates. (Available on everything) Pure Competition, 6 games with mods for competitive play outside of Free Party. Dynamic Soundtrack evolves as you absorb. DJ Booth, 1-4 players each with a song from the game can remix all of the music. (This can get messy, Sync button recommended) 14 Skins, 11 to unlock as you earn XP during play. Ele-Medals. Like Achievements, but you get a little medal and some coins when you earn them. (Also Steam achievements) Stats. Ele-Ments absorbed, Enemy types absorbed, Games played, Mistakes made, coins earned, Fireworks purchased and More. Personal stats, Name your self, choose a skin, rack up XP and Absorbs and see how long you've been playing. 129 Things to unlock.
